function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective partnerships between global, regional, national, and local governments, the private sector, and civil society.","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to contagious diseases and other global crises.","Mitigation":"Establishing and strengthening partnerships and collaboration across all levels of governance and sectors.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication technologies, data sharing tools.","People":"Global, regional, national, and local governments, private sector, civil society.","Owner":"Governing bodies, private sector leaders, civil society organizations."},{"Description":"Interrelationship between different Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), where the consequences of one SDG may impact another.","Impact":"Potential for negative impact on the achievement of various SDGs, such as reducing inequality and improving health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Integrated and coordinated approach to achieving SDGs, considering their interdependencies.","Technologies":"Data analytics, impact assessment tools, integrated planning platforms.","People":"Policy makers, development agencies, organizations working on SDGs.","Owner":"Government agencies, international development organizations."},{"Description":"Deficit of international solidarity in response to the pandemic, particularly affecting developing countries.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of developing countries to the ravages of contagious diseases, such as Covid-19.","Mitigation":"Strengthening global cooperation, resource sharing, and support for developing countries.","Technologies":"Global communication networks, resource allocation platforms, data-driven forecasting tools.","People":"Populations in developing countries, international aid organizations, global leaders.","Owner":"International aid organizations, global governance bodies, world leaders."}]}
